name: Add new Outseta persons to a Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new rows
description: Every time a new person is created in Outseta, Make will automatically add that person to a new row in your Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Jlg2-DmM6AAmV6aD1RkixdwBMMt_FIPcWDSev8BExSA/edit?usp=sharing).
